text: Petco is an American pet retailer headquartered in San Diego. They sell pet supplies and services like grooming in the United States and Mexico. It was founded as a mail order company in 1965. The first Petco store opened in 1976 in La Mesa, California. It has since grew to 1,000 locations in the United States, Puerto Rico and Mexico. ==Unleashed by Petco== Unleashed by Petco was a concept store first opened in Hillcrest, San Diego, California. The Unleashed by Petco stores were smaller than regular Petco locations. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1965 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in California Category:Pets
title: Petco
